Panel.Name: FileMenu
Panel.Label: Toolbar (Main Menu)
Panel.Description: The horizontal menu bar displayed at the top of the screen

Panel.Name: Toolbar
Panel.Label: Toolbar (Primary)
Panel.Description: The main toolbar, displayed across the top of the map

Panel.Name: ToolbarVertical
Panel.Label: Toolbar (Vertical)
Panel.Description: The vertical toolbar, displayed on the left side of the map

Panel.Name: Statusbar
Panel.Label: Status Bar
Panel.Description: The status bar, displayed below the map

Panel.Label: Map
Panel.Description: The main map display

Panel.Name: OverviewMap
Panel.Label: Map (Overview)
Panel.Description: The dialog containing the overview map

Panel.Label: Task Pane
Panel.Description: The dialog displaying the task pane

Panel.Description: The dialog displaying the legend

Panel.Name: SelectionPanel
Panel.Label: Selection Panel
Panel.Description: The dialog displaying current selection

Panel.Label: Navigator (Zoom Slider)
Panel.Description: The navigator and zoom slider
